item.title: Using Emacs's ansi-term with ZSH
item.description: If instead of Bash you’re using ZSH and you somehow decided to be even more hipster, you can try using ZSH from within Emacs. There are multiple terminal emulators accessible inside Emacs, but for me, when I had been running the whole setup on OSX, neither of them didn’t play nicely with ANSI escape codes. Solution which worked for me was described on StackOverflow and to work, required me to:
